segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I joined your group of bus tour this morning . You promised the journey will last 3 hours and we will visit 15 sightseeing spots .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I am sorry , sir . We will look into this matter . Would you please wait a moment here ?
segments.speaker: S1
